CustomField.formula: IF( Month_Target__c = TRUE, IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 01530000002K4PS", "True image",40,40), CASE( StageName , "Identification", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 01530000002K4Q6", "False", 50,40), "Conduct Due Diligence", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q6", "False", 50,40), "Review Customer Requirements", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q6", "False", 50,40), "Determine Solution", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q6", "False",50,40), "Closed Lost", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q6", "False",50,40), "Develop/Review Pricing Model", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q1", "False",50,40), "Finance Review", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q1", "False",50,40), "Develop Proposal", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q1", "False",50,40), "Proposal Presentation", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Q1", "False",50,40), "Solution Discussion and Negotiation", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Pr", "False",50,40), "Contract Preparation and Negotiation", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Pr", "False",50,40), "Legal Approval", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Pr", "False",50,40), "Financial Approval", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Pr", "False",50,40), "Deal Closure/Won", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002K4Pr", "False",50,40), "False image"))
CustomField.label: Status
